thread.title: Environmental Impact Won’t Be Part of Dietary Guidelines, Officials Say
thread.title_full: Environmental Impact Won’t Be Part of Dietary Guidelines, Officials Say - WSJ

author: Kelsey Gee
title: Environmental Impact Won’t Be Part of Dietary Guidelines, Officials Say
text:
Federal officials said they won’t consider food products’ impact on the environment as they prepare new U.S. dietary guidelines, rejecting a proposal by a government advisory panel.
The decision by Agriculture Secretary Tom Vilsack and Secretary of Health and Human Services Sylvia Burwell marks a victory for the U.S. meat industry, which pushed back against the February recommendation by a committee of nutrition experts recruited by the Obama administration.
